desc: We have many years experience, styling hotels, for television, weddings, big and small events. We love creating beautiful bouquets for birthdays, special occasions and just because it makes someones day. Fresh flowers and creative bouquets come out of our floral studio located in Auckland's CBD.

layout.text: The only thing we love the same as flowers - is plants! It's a thing and we definitely caught the plant addiction. Orchids, ferns, fiddle leafs, philodendrons, ficus, heart leaf, monstera, n'joy, callisia and peperomia to name just a few!
